description: Try our easy to follow Campbells Easy Pumpkin Soup  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pumpkin soup,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Campbells Easy Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan forced. Line an oven tray with baking paper. Place pumpkin, onion and garlic on the tray, drizzle with olive oil and roast for 20 mins until softened.
Place roasted pumpkin, onion and garlic (skin removed) in a medium saucepan. Add Campbell’s Real Stock Chicken. Bring to the boil, simmer for 5 mins.
Using a stick blender or food processor puree soup until smooth.
Ladle soup into bowls and garnish it with chives.
